graph_title: Number of companies publishing sustainability reports
indicator_name: Number of companies publishing sustainability reports
target_name: 기업들이(특히, 대기업 및 다국적기업) 보고체계에 지속가능성 관련 정보를 반영토록하고 지속가능한 기업 활동을 이행하도록 권고
page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
title: Number of companies publishing sustainability reports
target: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle
